com.jpower.annotations.info.Contact

    Package Description
    com.jpower.date

    • Uses of Contact in com.jpower.date

      Classes in com.jpower.date with annotations of type Contact 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DateDiff
      DateDiff representa a diferença de tempo entre duas datas.
      class  SimpleDate
      SimpleDate armazena e manipula datas de forma simples e compatível com java.util.Date e java.util.Calendar.

    • Uses of Contact in com.jpower.date.test

      Classes in com.jpower.date.test with annotations of type Contact 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TestDateDiff
      public class TestDateDiff { public static void main(String[] args) { Date d = new Date(0); SimpleDate d1 = SimpleDate.parseDate("14/08/1984 23:45:00"); SimpleDate d2 = SimpleDate.now(); System.out.println(d1); System.out.println(d2); DateDiff dif = new DateDiff(d1, d2); dif.setUseDaylightTime(false); Date start = new Date(); System.out.println(dif.calculate()); Date end = new Date(); System.out.println(); System.out.println(dif); System.out.println(new DateDiff(start, end).calculate()); System.out.println(); System.out.println("toMillis = "+dif.toMillis()); System.out.println("toSeconds = "+dif.toSeconds()); System.out.println("toMinutes = "+dif.toMinutes()); System.out.println("toHours = "+dif.toHours()); System.out.println("toDays = "+dif.toDays()); System.out.println("toMonths = "+dif.toMonths()); System.out.println(new SimpleDate().time(dif.toMillis())); System.out.println(); System.out.println(); SimpleDate now = SimpleDate.now(); SimpleDate june = new SimpleDate().date(2011, 1, 14, 18, 20); System.out.println(june); june = new SimpleDate().date(2011, 2, 14, 18, 20); System.out.println(june); june = new SimpleDate().date(2011, 3, 14, 18, 20); System.out.println(june); june = new SimpleDate().date(2011, 4, 14, 18, 20); System.out.println(june); System.out.println(); System.out.println(june.month(7)); System.out.println(june.day(5)); System.out.println(june.year(2012)); System.out.println(june.hour(5)); System.out.println(june.day()); System.out.println(june.date(2000, 7, 7)); System.out.println("now: "+ now); System.out.println("june: "+ june); dif = new DateDiff(now, june); System.out.println(dif); System.out.println(dif); } }
      class  TestSimpleDate
      public class TestSimpleDate { public static void main(String[] args) { SimpleDate ontem = SimpleDate.now().subDay(1); System.out.println("ontem = "+ontem); SimpleDate amanha = SimpleDate.now().addDay(1); System.out.println("amanhã = "+amanha); SimpleDate hoje = new SimpleDate().setNow(); System.out.println("hoje = "+hoje); SimpleDate saida = SimpleDate.parseDate("16/11/2011 17:20:00"); System.out.println("saída = "+saida); SimpleDate longdate = SimpleDate.parseDate("Segunda-feira, 21 de Março de 2011, 13:50:00"); System.out.println("longdate = "+longdate); System.out.println(); System.out.println("saída > hoje = "+saida.after(hoje)); System.out.println("saída < amanhã = "+saida.before(amanha)); System.out.println("saída < ontem = "+saida.before(ontem)); System.out.println(); System.out.println("hoje.diff(saida) = "+hoje.diff(saida)); System.out.println("ontem.diff(hoje) = "+ontem.diff(hoje)); System.out.println("hoje.diff(ontem) = "+hoje.diff(ontem)); System.out.println("hoje.diff(amanha) = "+hoje.diff(amanha)); System.out.println(); System.out.println("hoje.addHour(1) = "+hoje.addHour(1)); System.out.println("hoje.diff(saida) = "+hoje.diff(saida)); System.out.println("hoje.subHour(1) = "+hoje.subHour(1)); System.out.println("hoje.diff(saida) = "+hoje.diff(saida)); System.out.println(); System.out.println(ontem.format(SimpleDate.DDMMYYYY_SLASH)); System.out.println(hoje.format(SimpleDate.LONG_DATE)); System.out.println(amanha.format(SimpleDate.DDMMYYYY_HHMMSS_DOT)); System.out.println(saida.format(SimpleDate.DDMMYYYY_HHMMSS_DASH)); System.out.println(saida.format(SimpleDate.LONG_DATE_TIME)); System.out.println(hoje.format(SimpleDate.HHMMSSNNN)); } }
